Headline: #94 California Temporary Reroute at California/42nd
ShortDescription: 94 California buses are temporarily rerouted via California, 47th, Kedzie, Archer and California, due to street blockage near California/42nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#94 California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via California, 47th, Kedzie, Archer and California, due to street blockage near California/42nd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 79th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 79th.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
